title: National Merit Scholarship
desc: A scholarship for meritorious students pursuing higher education.

title: Skill Development Student Loan
eligibility[1]: Enrolled in certified skill training programs
desc: A low-interest loan designed to support youth in completing technical and vocational training programs.

title: Startup Innovation Grant
eligibility[1]: Focus on science, technology, or innovation
desc: A government incentive program supporting startups with seed funding and mentorship for innovative projects.

title: Bright Future Scholarship Program
desc: A need-based scholarship that supports talented students from economically weaker backgrounds to pursue higher education.

title: Prime Startup Loan Scheme
authority: Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises
eligibility[1]: Registered MSMEs with valid business plans
desc: A government-backed loan program that provides financial support to small business owners and entrepreneurs to promote self-employment and innovation.

title: Inspire Teaching Excellence Award
eligibility[0]: School teachers with 5+ years of experience
eligibility[1]: Proven record of innovation in classroom teaching
desc: An annual incentive recognizing teachers who demonstrate outstanding dedication and creativity in improving the quality of education.
